nodes.text: The Shipwrights' Trace was a hyperlane which passed through the Inner Rim. Planets on the route included Quarzite and Whiforla II. Deep Current, an information-gathering resistance group, operated in the hyperlane during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. During the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire, Chancellor Mon Mothma tasked Luke Skywalker with retrieving logs of Imperial communications that were intercepted by rebel cells operating along the Shipwrights' Trace.
